src_text: Mu tshidimu tshia 1624 Dutch wa kubutshika kua tshisumbu tshinena tshia mpetu tshia Indian bashi tshisumbu tshia dingomba diabu ku Southwestern Taiwan, tshi longesha dishidimuka dia malua a madimi ne kupesha bantu midimu ya kukuna ngosa ne mienga ya nsukali.
ref_text: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations.
hyp_text: In 1624, the Dutch established a stronghold in southwestern Taiwan, which became a base for pirates and smugglers to plunder Chinese junks and trade with the local indigenous people.

[Luba-Kasai]: Kadi, ba Belge ne bena mu Suisse batu bakula Frncais bavua ba ilonge ku tulasa, nunku badi mua ku kumvua nansha wewe ubala mu Francais wa bantu bonso.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Luba-Kasai]: Kunyima kua ma siecle, bantu bavua bibake mu lutulu ma terraces pa muaba mudifuke ni musokome too ni pa muaba mubandile wa mbuwa.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Luba-Kasai]: Meta 800 a systeme wa tuyau wa Trans-Alaska avua makanga bilondeshela ditangalaka dia binunu bia bungulu ya mafuta a brut a Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Luba-Kasai]: Dituku diva dimanyika dia mufikilu wa bena Belegi diva dituku dia mufikilu bena Luxembourg kadi lelu dikadi dilua dituku dia mufiklu wa mulamukilu mubidimu 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Luba-Kasai]: Kubangila diba divua yi muenze tshintu etshi, Onion mmulue ngumu ya milondangane, ni divudija dia mikanda, ni bia kumwenena pa enternete biangata 5,000,000 bua muntu umue mu ngodowa dikumi, ads wende, meba 24 bua ngumu ya mulupepele pa rezo, ma emision, ni Atlas mupia mupia udi ubikidibua Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Ditantshishibua edi didi muaku udi usangisha ngenyi ya miaba mishilashilangana mu diteta, kupitshila ku dinana dia meji anyi ditantshishibue dia bihidi bia kuulu mu mushindu mutshintshika udi nyuma wa muntu olombodibue kudi mamania mabuikidibue masangisha ku mikenji ya malongesha a science ni dimueneshibue dia ditantshishibue.
ref_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
hyp_text: In the past, the study of the behavior of celestial bodies in the universe was hindered by the lack of advanced technology, but with the invention of new instruments and modern equipment, scientists have been able to make great strides in understanding the mysteries of the universe and have made significant discoveries in the field of space science.

src_text: Diunvuija dia kudi baabunyi bua ditantshishibua edi didi difila ngenyi minena ibidi: se ditantshishibua dia ngenyi nkayadi didi dilonda citupa cilepa panyima pa bienzedi biabu anyi bienzedi bia balombodi, ne ditanta edi mudipingaja didi ne "bipeta" mu miaba ya midimu bidi bikala munda, pamutu pa kansungasunga.
ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
hyp_text: The way of cooking the food of our ancestors is different from today: the way of cooking the food of our ancestors was to put the pot on three stones, and the pot was covered with a lid, and they would put the food in the pot and let it cook slowly over low heat, and they would not stir the food with a spoon, but would rather use a stick to stir it.

hyp_text: The concept of mass and matter. Matter is anything that occupies space and has atomic structure.

[Luba-Kasai]: Kadi, ba Belge ne bena mu Suisse batu bakula Frncais bavua ba ilonge ku tulasa, nunku badi mua ku kumvua nansha wewe ubala mu Francais wa bantu bonso.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Luba-Kasai]: Kunyima kua ma siecle, bantu bavua bibake mu lutulu ma terraces pa muaba mudifuke ni musokome too ni pa muaba mubandile wa mbuwa.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Luba-Kasai]: Meta 800 a systeme wa tuyau wa Trans-Alaska avua makanga bilondeshela ditangalaka dia binunu bia bungulu ya mafuta a brut a Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Luba-Kasai]: Dituku diva dimanyika dia mufikilu wa bena Belegi diva dituku dia mufikilu bena Luxembourg kadi lelu dikadi dilua dituku dia mufiklu wa mulamukilu mubidimu 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Luba-Kasai]: Kubangila diba divua yi muenze tshintu etshi, Onion mmulue ngumu ya milondangane, ni divudija dia mikanda, ni bia kumwenena pa enternete biangata 5,000,000 bua muntu umue mu ngodowa dikumi, ads wende, meba 24 bua ngumu ya mulupepele pa rezo, ma emision, ni Atlas mupia mupia udi ubikidibua Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}
